Module kivakit.kernel
Package com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.strings

Class CaseFormat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.kernel.language.strings.CaseFormat
  • public class CaseFormat
extends java.lang.Object
    Converts between different styles of casing:
    • camelCase
    • Capitalized
    • lower-hyphenated
    • UPPER_UNDERSCORE
    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
